title: GlobalProtect gateway RCE is treated as an internet edge server exploit

entry.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can execute arbitrary code in the GlobalProtect gateway interface of PAN-OS next-generation firewalls.

title: Ivanti EPMM admin portal authentication bypass stays on the edge

entry.vulnerabilityName: Ivanti EPMM admin portal authentication bypass
entry.description: The Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) admin portal allows remote unauthenticated attackers to bypass authentication on the mobile device management gateway.

title: Cisco IOS XE Web UI LFI drives server-side RCE classification

entry.vulnerabilityName: Cisco IOS XE Web UI local file inclusion
entry.description: An unauthenticated attacker can leverage a local file inclusion in the Cisco IOS XE Web UI management portal to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

title: Zimbra ICS attachments do not trigger industrial control classifications

entry.vulnerabilityName: ZCS Classic Web Client ICS cross-site scripting
entry.description: Synacor Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability that exists in the Classic Web Client due to insufficient sanitization of HTML content in ICS files.

title: Local Hyper-V privilege escalation drops the mixed context flag

entry.vulnerabilityName: Hyper-V Integration VSP use-after-free privilege escalation
entry.description: Microsoft Windows Hyper-V NT Kernel Integration VSP contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows a local attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.

title: Improper privilege management issues map to logic flaws

entry.vulnerabilityName: Windows Error Reporting Service improper privilege management
entry.description: Microsoft Windows Error Reporting Service contains an improper privilege management vulnerability that allows a local attacker with user permissions to gain SYSTEM privileges.

title: Local Junos OS isolation bug stays server-side without mixed flag

entry.vulnerabilityName: Junos OS improper isolation allows local code injection
entry.description: Juniper Junos OS contains an improper isolation or compartmentalization vulnerability that allows a local attacker with high privileges to inject arbitrary code.

title: Zimbra ICS XSS is treated as client-side code execution

entry.vulnerabilityName: ZCS Classic Web Client ICS cross-site scripting
entry.description: Synacor Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability in the Classic Web Client where a malicious ICS attachment can execute embedded JavaScript when viewed.

title: Cisco NX-OS CLI injection keeps server bias without mixed context

entry.description: Cisco NX-OS contains a command injection vulnerability in the CLI that allows an authenticated, local attacker to execute commands as root on the underlying operating system of an affected device.

title: JAVS Viewer installer supply chain issue avoids mixed flag

entry.vulnerabilityName: JAVS Viewer installer ships malicious ffmpeg
entry.description: Justice AV Solutions (JAVS) Viewer installer contains a malicious version of ffmpeg.exe that establishes a backdoor connection to a malicious C2 server when executed.

title: Android Pixel notification spoof stays client-side without mixed flag

entry.vulnerabilityName: Pixel foreground service notification information disclosure
entry.description: Android Pixel contains a Framework vulnerability where a misleading foreground service notification can be hidden, enabling a local attacker to disclose sensitive information.

title: Dante Discovery DLL sideload stays ICS without mixed flag

entry.description: Dante Discovery contains a process control vulnerability in mDNSResponder.exe that allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code through a DLL sideloading attack in the Dante Application Library.

title: Follina MSDT exploit is treated as client-side non-memory RCE

entry.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows MSDT Follina remote code execution
entry.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when MSDT is invoked via the ms-msdt protocol from a Microsoft Office application such as Word, allowing code execution with the application's privileges.

title: Windows AppX Installer spoofing remains a non-web client issue

entry.vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows AppX Installer spoofing vulnerability
entry.description: Microsoft Windows AppX Installer contains a spoofing vulnerability that enables attackers to trick users into installing malicious packages through the desktop installer experience.

title: Chrome SimplifiedLowering overflow is tagged as client-side memory corruption

entry.description: Google Chrome before 87.0.4280.88 contains an integer overflow in the V8 SimplifiedLowering phase that enables attackers to achieve arbitrary code execution inside the browser renderer.

title: MaraCMS arbitrary file upload is server-side non-memory RCE

entry.vulnerabilityName: MaraCMS arbitrary PHP file upload remote code execution
entry.description: MaraCMS 7.5 and prior allow authenticated administrators to upload arbitrary PHP files via handler.php and execute them via HTTP requests, enabling remote command execution on the server.

title: Citrix NetScaler memory overflow is treated as server-side memory corruption

entry.description: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway contain a memory overflow vulnerability that could allow for remote code execution and/or denial of service.

title: Erlang OTP SSH missing authentication is classified as an auth bypass

entry.description: Erlang Erlang/OTP SSH server contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability that allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands without valid credentials, enabling unauthenticated remote code execution.

title: Appsmith remote command execution is flagged as command injection

entry.description: An incorrectly configured PostgreSQL instance in the Appsmith image leads to remote command execution inside the Appsmith Docker container.
